I'm Jung.

Once upon a time in Seoul, a curious soul was born with an affinity for code.
As the years danced by, destiny led me to the bustling city of Chicago to delve into the art of web development.
My journey is woven with a love for crafting interactive experiences, and an appreciation for clean aesthetics.
